JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Finnish speaking part time service consultant - Suomenkielinen osa-aikainen asiakaspalvelija
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Nordiccom Communications in Copenhagen City is looking for a Finnish speaking part time service consultant for soft debt reminders.

The task consists of contacting current Finnish bank customers in a service errand with a soft reminder on arrears. You will be part of an international team, who strives for common goals, but will also work independently. The job is well suited for students and/or who seek to earn extra.

Our expectations : 

  • You speak and understand Finnish
  • You are result oriented
  • You are professional

We can offer you :

  • A professional, yet informal work environment
  • Helpful colleagues
  • Flexible work hours
  • Fixed salary
  • Attractive facilities in the middle of Copenhagen, in Gammeltorv 
  • A foot inside the financial sector

Nordiccom Communications ApS is a Nordic company placed in the heart of Copenhagen. With the entire Nordic market as our workplace and the phone as our tool Nordiccom specializes in customer service and advising customers in arrears. Nordiccom, divided over two different offices in Denmark and one also in Helsinki, consists of 85 employees in Danish, Swedish and Finnish teams, so the communication between the teams is in English. Our projects are primarily B2C and we always emphasize professionalism towards our customers. We ensure the quality of our products and services and comply with banks’ standards and code of conduct.

Our goals are for our employees to become skilled at their tasks and achieve good results and high end customer satisfaction, therefore there will be a thorough training of new employees, with follow-up training as the work continues.

Have we awakened your interest? Then don't hesitate to send us your resume and applications to mail hr@nordiccom.dk.
